entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot find `ShellHandler` under `Microsoft.Maui.Handlers` #16424
  • Unable to launch app on iOS from both VS and VS MAC #16421
  • Android app crashes with an ANR on .NET 8 preview 6 #16418
  • ScrollView with Orientation=Both does not have correct values in ScrollX and ScrollY properties #16417
  • [MAUI]The Horizontal Scrolling does not work on MacCatalyst target. #16416
  • when I release an APP, it can't display binding data properly, but it will display properly when I run it in debug mode. #16414

Closed

  • Clipping an Image with a Border has a gap on Windows #9129
    .NET 8 GA
  • Embedding .NET MAUI in a native WinUI 3 App doesn't work as expected - Not even launching #11516
    Backlog
  • Merging ResourceDictionary from referenced assembly fails to compile #4398
    Backlog
  • A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App My Recipes New_New Recipe_NonTextContrast: Disabled "Save" button is not looking like disabled. #15740
    .NET 8 GA
  • A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App My Recipes New_New Recipe_New Recipe_Labels or Instructions: In "New Recipe" screen required fields are not marked up with any chevron/symbols. #15743
    .NET 8 GA
  • A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App My Recipes New_New Recipe_Screen reader: After changing the value for review, Screen reader is not announcing new value its announcing incorrect rating value. #15741
    .NET 8 GA

PullRequests

Created

  • [ci] Run Codesign Verification after MSI creation #16423
  • [ci] Sign unsigned .net 8 preview 7 files #16422

Merged

  • [Windows] Fix Border corners clipping issue #14403
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border, .NET 8 GA
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview7] [C] fix SelectedIndex propagation for picker #16412
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #16420
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16413
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview7] [build] CI build fixes and UItests #16419
  • [build] CI build fixes and UItests #16401
  • [C] fix SelectedIndex propagation for picker #16387
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-picker
  • [tests] consolidate various DoesNotLeak tests #16407
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Add visual testing support, on top of Appium #14999
    area/testing
  • Fix device tests to tun on arm64 #16408
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Document Element #16299
    area/docs 📓
  • Reinstate IContentView and ILayout methods #16411
    area/layout 🔲, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Add Position property to DragStartingEventArgs and DragEventArgs #16335
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures
  • Add ViewHandler Mapper docs #16296
    area/docs 📓
  • [net7.0] Revert default for UseSafeAreaProperty to value from .NET 6 for iOS #16379
  • Setting binding on Label doesn't set text to incoming binding #16410
    .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Fix issue setting CarouselView position on Ctor or Appearing #16165
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Fix SwipeView not swiping using Label as direct content #14824
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [iOS] Fix ScrollTo method issues #15984
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, layout-scrollview
  • [C] fix Specificity for VSM #16404
    area/Xaml </>
  • [iOS] Re-enable editor tests #16365
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • [iOS] Fix WordWrap not working when Padding is set on Label #16136
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-label
  • Wrap Image with a grid on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #15122
    area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • Add a UI test for tapping on a label span #16222
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
